actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend an emergency flood control authorization in order to authorize emergency protection work in the event of anticipated volcanic eruption.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act to authorize the Chief of Engineers to furnish the minimum protection necessary to prevent loss of life and property damage caused by lava flow.

titles.title: A bill to amend an emergency flood control authorization in order to authorize emergency protection work in the event of anticipated volcanic eruption.
